Title: Update 273 – IAEA Director General Statement on Situation in Ukra...
Description: Director General Rafael Mariano Grossi met with President Volodymyr Zelensky and assessed damage to energy infrastructure vital for nuclear safety during his 11th visit to Ukraine since the military conflict began almost three years ago, as part of the ongoing efforts of the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) to help prevent a nuclear accident.

Title: Call for Papers: Conference on Resilience of Nuclear Installation...
Description: Interested contributors have until 31 May 2025 to submit synopses for the IAEA’s first International Conference on Resilience of Nuclear Installations against External Events from a Safety Perspective.

Title: VIDEO: IAEA Director General in Ukraine
Description: IAEA Director General Rafael Mariano Grossi is in Ukraine to assess damage to key electricity infrastructure that is critical to the country’s nuclear safety.

Title: IAEA Follow-up Mission Recognizes Spain’s Continued Commitment to...
Description: An International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) team of experts assessed that Spain showed a strong commitment to nuclear and radiation safety, and confirmed that Spain has successfully enhanced its regulatory framework, fully implementing recommendations made during the Agency’s 2018 mission.

Title: World Cancer Day: Bringing Life-saving Care to Those Who Need it ...
Description: Through our fast-growing programmes and the Rays of Hope initiative, the IAEA is expanding access to nuclear medicine and cancer treatment in low- and middle-income countries, supporting care to patients around the world with little or no access to treatment.

Title: Halting Wetland Loss through Nuclear Techniques
Description: World Wetlands Day highlights the importance of conserving these threatened ecosystems. The IAEA is helping to protect wetlands with isotopic techniques.

Title: Update 272 – IAEA Director General Statement on Situation in Ukra...
Description: Director General Rafael Mariano Grossi will travel to Ukraine next week for high-level meetings in Kyiv, in which the ongoing efforts of the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) to help prevent a nuclear accident during the military conflict will be discussed.

Title: IAEA Sees Operational Safety Commitment at Novovoronezh Nuclear P...
Description: An IAEA team of experts said that the operator of the Novovoronezh Nuclear Power Plant in the Russian Federation has shown a commitment to enhancing operational safety.

Title: Papua New Guinea Resumes Radiotherapy, Starts Brachytherapy Servi...
Description: January is Cervical Cancer Awareness Month. The IAEA is helping Papua New Guinea start brachytherapy services to treat women with cervical cancer.

Title: IAEA Board of Governors Elects New Chairperson for 2025
Description: In a special meeting today the IAEA Board of Governors elected Ambassador Matilda Aku Alomatu Osei-Agyeman of Ghana as its Chairperson for 2025.

Title: Nuclear Energy in the Clean Energy Transition
Description: As the world marks the International Day of Clean Energy in 2025, global momentum behind nuclear energy continues to build, with the clean power source set to generate record levels of electricity in the year ahead.
